body.p:
To His Excellency
Thos E Bramlett
Governor of Kentucky
Your Petitioners

Would Respectfully Represent that at the October Term of the Lawrence Circuit Court Lee Roberts was Indicted for Carrying Concealed weapons a Coppy of Said Indictment accompanys this Petition We have know Lee Roberts for some years He was during the War a Good Soldier in the 39th KY Co A & had been threatened by two Brothers by the name of Low the Difficulty Orginated in the Arrest while a Soldier of a Rebel Citizen by (Lee Roberts under Orders)

Your Petitioners would Represent that Lee Roberts was a good soldier & should not be Run to costs in this Case as he is & was Justifiable in Carrying the weapons for Self Defense & we Pray Your Excellency To Pardon Said Lee Roberts the Offense

Respectfully Yours
George W Pack
